item.title: _Extract data from MongoDB using python
item.description: #data-engineering #python #pandas #mongodb The problem I’m currently working for a company that began using MongoDB as its primary database. The problem is that it was supposed to be only for the MVP, but it kept growing and growing and since Mongo doesn’t care about typing, we end up with lots of unstructured data, garbage, and even sometimes, a truly macaronic bundle of arrays inside jsons inside arrays the definition of a rat’s nest…
